[++Model 3D Changer++]

[Info]
{Here some of my code which allows to control birds or zombies which makes the game fun, damn it woobly why it's not basic in the game}

[Normal Model]
00240FD8 BF800000
00240FE4 3C23D70A
00240FD4 3F800000
002621D4 3FC00000
0048B38C 0884FFDC
0048B390 0885091C
0048B394 0885125C
0048B38C 0884F2A8
0048B388 0884F2A8

[Player]
00240FD8 BF800000
00240FE4 3C23D70A
00240FD4 3F800000
0048B388 0884F2A8

[Goose are zombie]
0048B394 0885091C

[Zombie are player]
0048B390 0884F2A8
0048B38C 0884F2A8

[Goose controller]
002621D4 3F000000
002620DC 0A000000
0048B388 0885125C
0048B38C 0884FFDC
D2000000 00000000
00240FD8 C1FFFFFF
00240FE4 3D000000
00240FD4 41000000
F0000001 00000001
F1482F10 3F100000
D2000000 00000000
DD000000 00000800
F0000001 00000001
F3482F10 BE000000
D3000000 00483740
C0000000 00000010
20000000 00000001
DC000000 00000848
D2000000 00000000
{L: Fly Up DPadDowm: Fly Down}

[Zombie controller]
0048359C 00000000
